events.message: Customer reported a car collision that occurred on 2024-04-29 involving their sedan and another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident based on keywords such as vehicle, collision, and accident present in the report.
An experienced claims agent has been assigned to the case to ensure proper handling and quicker resolution of the vehicle accident claim.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the claim and confirmed that insurance processes have been initiated for the customer's vehicle accident.
The claim handler requested police reports, photos of the damaged vehicle, and medical bills related to any injuries from the accident.
The customer uploaded and submitted all requested documents including police report, vehicle photos, and repair estimates for review.
The claims department began investigation by verifying the submitted documents and contacting third parties involved in the auto collision.
Investigation confirmed liability of the other driver and validated all submitted documents; repair costs and medical expenses were confirmed.
A final settlement offer was proposed to cover vehicle repairs and medical expenses, pending customer review and approval.
The customer accepted the proposed settlement amount and expressed satisfaction with the efficiency and fairness of the claims process.
Based on customer acceptance and investigation results, the claim was officially approved for payment disbursement.
The insurance payout covering all approved repairs and medical bills was issued to the customerâ€™s bank account.
The claim was closed successfully after confirming all payments were received and no further actions from the customer were required.
All case documents and communications were archived securely in the company database for future reference if needed.
